content: #18865 and !4#3634 deal with an annoying universe regression on the mathlib4 side. Could we at least merge !4#3634? If there is an objection to #18865 then we will either need an alternative fix on the mathlib4 side, or just lose synchronization.
The porting note makes it look like this is working as intended; the only thing that jumps out to me is that the unspecified universe parameter should be first not last
